Reviews.Title: Wonderful pink birthday gift
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This was bought as a birthday gift for my friend who desperately needed a phone and who loves pink! She found the size to be cute and loves it. She has not had any problems with it so far.

Reviews.Title: data and pic message don't work
Reviews.Author: aimd
Reviews.Content: After many email to and from Blu, My phone will not send or receive any MMS files.  Blu emailed, saying there are different models of the swing m110 and not all of them do MMS or data.

ProductInfo.Features:
This Unlocked Dual SIM Cell Phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Dual SIM Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 MHz (Both SIMs) and GPRS data capabilities.
Dual SIM Card support; Social Networking Capabilities; 1.3MP Camera, 1280 x 1024 pixels and Video Recording; FM radio; Bluetooth v2.0 with A2DP; Music and Video player.
TFT Display, 56K Colors; Organizer; Internal Memory of 64 MB ROM, 32 MB RAM; Games; Java capabilities; WAP 2.0/xHTML Browser and microSD expendability up to 8GB.
Talk time up to 1 hr 30 min - Standby up to 150 hrs.
ProductInfo.Name: BLU M110 Swing Unlocked Quad Band Dual SIM Phone with 1.3MP Camera, FM Radio, Bluetooth and Social Networking - Unlocked Phone - US Warranty - Pink
